attributes.action: Make it illegal for drivers to drive off after hitting a cat.
attributes.additional_details: I believe cats are more at risk to being run over than a Dog. Cats are independent animals and have experienced first hand the devastation this can cause to a family. Dogs are often kept on leads and statistics released by Highways England show that cats are dying more because of roadkill than Dogs.
attributes.background: Add cats and grant the same status as Dogs to the Road Traffic Act 1998

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Make it illegal to flee after hitting a cat.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/548371

Make it a requirement to report hitting a cat whilst driving
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566080
